languages.text: {n}Иремерисс смеется — звук напоминает шипение змеи.{/n} "О, мон-кай. Тебе не откажешь в наглости. Будешь ли ты таким же нахальным, когда я вырву твои жилы и подвешу тебя за них?"

{n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"
languages.original_text: {n}Иремерисс смеется — звук напоминает шипение змеи.{/n} "О, мон-кай. Тебе не откажешь в наглости. Будешь ли ты таким же нахальным, когда я вырву твои жилы и подвешу тебя за них?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake's hiss.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. Your are a brazen one, are you not? Will you still be so brash when I drag out your tendons and use them to hang you on a hook?"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake's hiss.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. Your are a brazen one, are you not? Will you still be so brash when I drag out your tendons and use them to hang you on a hook?"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I rip out your tendons and use them to hang you on a hook?"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss éclate d'un rire évoquant le sifflement d'un serpent.{/n} « Oh, mon-keigh. Vous ne manquez pas de culot ! Ferez-vous toujours preuve d'autant de verve quand je vous écorcherai vifvive et que je vous pendrai par les entrailles ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss éclate d'un rire évoquant le sifflement d'un serpent.{/n} « Oh, mon-keigh. Vous ne manquez pas de culot ! Ferez-vous toujours preuve d'autant de verve quand je vous écorcherai vifvive et que je vous pendrai par les entrailles ? »
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: {n}伊芮梅莉斯大笑起来，声音仿佛毒蛇的嘶嘶声。{/n}“噢，你可真是只不知天高地厚的猴子，是吧？等我把你开膛破肚，抽筋剥皮之后，你还会这么厚颜无耻吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊芮梅莉斯大笑起来，声音仿佛毒蛇的嘶嘶声。{/n}“噢，你可真是只不知天高地厚的猴子，是吧？等我把你开膛破肚，抽筋剥皮之后，你还会这么厚颜无耻吗？”
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss lacht. Das Geräusch erinnert an eine zischende Schlange.{/n} "Ach, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr seid ja wirklich verwegen. Werdet Ihr auch noch so kühn sein, wenn ich Euch häute und an Euren Sehnen aufknüpfe?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss lacht. Das Geräusch erinnert an eine zischende Schlange.{/n} "Ach, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr seid ja wirklich verwegen. Werdet Ihr auch noch so kühn sein, wenn ich Euch häute und an Euren Sehnen aufknüpfe?"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss se ríe. El sonido te recuerda al siseo de una serpiente.{/n} «Vaya, mon-keigh. Menudas agallas tienes, ¿eh? ¿Mostrarás la misma bravuconería cuando te despelleje y te cuelgue de los tendones?».
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss se ríe. El sonido te recuerda al siseo de una serpiente.{/n} «Vaya, mon-keigh. Menudas agallas tienes, ¿eh? ¿Mostrarás la misma bravuconería cuando te despelleje y te cuelgue de los tendones?».
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: {n}イレメリスは声を上げて笑う。その笑い声は、ヘビのようなシューという音を彷彿とさせた。{/n}「ああ、モン＝ケイ。お前は図太い奴だな？私が皮を剥いで腱で吊るし上げたときも、まだそれほどデカい口をきけるかな？」
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イレメリスは声を上げて笑う。その笑い声は、ヘビのようなシューという音を彷彿とさせた。{/n}「ああ、モン＝ケイ。お前は図太い奴だな？私が皮を剥いで腱で吊るし上げたときも、まだそれほどデカい口をきけるかな？」
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss gülüyor. Sesi, tıslayan bir yılanı andırıyor.{/n} "Ya mon-keigh. Ne kadar da arsızsın. Derini yüzüp kaslarını yırttığımda da bu kadar arsız olabilecek misin acaba?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss laughs. The sound is reminiscent of a snake hissing.{/n} "Oh, mon-keigh. You are a brazen one, aren't you? Will you still be so brash when I flay you open and string you up by your sinews?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss gülüyor. Sesi tıslayan bir yılanı andırıyor.{/n} "Ah mon-keigh. Ne kadar da arsızsın. Derini yüzdüğümde ve kaslarını yırttığımda da bu kadar arsız olabilecek misin acaba?"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit
